name: Transylvania: FANTASTIC EDITION!
description:
Traverse through Bran Castle and defeat the evil Dracula!

Find the ladders in each level to go to the next stage until you find Dracula.

WASD to move.

IJKL to throw stakes.

You can kill enemies by running into them, but you'll also get hurt.

Use stakes to kill things without hurting yourself. Remember, you only have 9. Use them wisely!

This was a project done in collaboration with Mickey Delp for an arduino controlled LED Matrix with speakers and custom controller that he built himself. The LED Matrix featured this and several other games at Fantastic Fest and Fantastic Arcade!
